info.title: Wild Fantasy API
info.description: API documentation for managing characters, factions, places, species, items, and more in the Wild Fantasy universe. Login

BearerAuth.name: Authorization
BearerAuth.description: Enter your token in the format: Bearer <token>

get.description: Retrieve all abilities associated with the authenticated user.

401.description: Unauthorized - No token provided or invalid

post.description: Create a new ability associated with the authenticated user.

401.description: Unauthorized - No token provided or invalid

get.description: Retrieve a specific ability by its ID, only if the authenticated user has access.

401.description: Unauthorized - No token provided or invalid

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have access to this ability

message.example: Forbidden - You don't have access to this ability

put.description: Update an existing ability by ID if the authenticated user has access.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have access

message.example: Forbidden - You do not have permission to update this ability

delete.description: Delete an ability by ID if the authenticated user has access.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have access

message.example: Forbidden - You do not have permission to delete this ability

get.description: Retrieve all characters associated with the authenticated user.

401.description: Unauthorized - No token provided or invalid

post.description: Create a new character associated with the authenticated user.

401.description: Unauthorized - No token provided or invalid

get.description: Retrieve a character by ID, with authentication and validation.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Character ID (must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId)

put.description: Updates a character\'s details. Only the owner can update it.

400.description: Invalid character ID or bad request

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

delete.description: Deletes a character by its ID. Only the owner of the character can delete it.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission
